file_content.text: Internal transmitters reveal you convey the optimization solution to me. I also scan a crude Ugnaught porcine-biped proposal of collaboration. Curious.
I think you'll find that datapad worth reading.
The Ugnaughts need your help.
The Ugnaught porcine-bipeds submit esteem for my efforts and honor my faculties. This is unforeseen pleasantness.
This is a great opportunity to show your skills as an Administrator unit.
You should like collaboration.
This unlikely collaboration acknowledges my true aptitude. What a purple tangent, to achieve astounding me this way.
You're all a bunch of weirdos. I'm sure you'll get along great.
Freaks should work together.
The Ugnaught porcine-bipeds express similar disgruntlement with your species. This describes a foundation for collaboration.
Internal tracking transmitters reveal you convey the optimization solution. Were the Ugnaught porcine-bipeds made to regret their plunder?
The Ugnaughts won't bother you again.
Our problem is solved.
Ah, superior. This red tangent generates appreciativeness, black bisector.
You submit unexpected vagueness of description. I suspect the plunderers evaded full reparations.
I don't think you'll have to worry about those little piggies anytime soon.
I gave them a real scare.
You manufactured fear in the plunderers? I anticipated more determined sanctions than that.
I submit that Ugnaught porcine-bipeds are an infestation. I recommend your leaders take precautionary steps to prevent their propagation.
With this optimization solution repossessed, Coruscant's waste processors revive. Filth-disease-poison levels recede, plague outbreaks averted. All resolves to purple parallel.
The black bisector comes! Pleasing, as it is needed.
I am In-iK, science unit. Please "talk up" if your comprehension white-shifts. I will use simple-happy language-words to help you understand.
I do... appreciate anything you can do.
Thank you.
Indubitably!
What's with your language, anyway? I can barely understand you.
Tell me about yourselves.
The Gree language-form is dissimilar to Basic language-form. Because Gree senses are unique red bisectors!
Five Gree senses analyze forms. Three Gree senses soak color. So goes language. Other species miscommunicate our language-words.
Interesting. That's not why you wanted to talk to me, though.
I see.
Yes. A blue vertex has been achieved, and we must embed ourselves.
Ultimately, diversity is what makes the Republic strong.
Yet we learn a lot this way.
Yes. The Republic is point-of-intersection for many, and Coruscant for most. But Coruscant is now our difficulty.
Are you calling me stupid?
That sounds like an insult.
All apologies. We should obliterate "small talk" now and move forward.
Pat-aK has planted information inside you. But I am the most powerful power-overseer, and responsibility for darkness is mine.
Coruscant power comes from the Works. Darkness comes from the Works. Coruscant-Senators, traders are blind. The power-darkness must stop.
You're talking about blackouts?
Power-darkness?
Yes? Perhaps we understand.
Repeat that. The Works are where Coruscant's power is generated?
What about the Works?
Politicians and merchants are always complaining. I wouldn't worry about it.
Lousy whining Senators.
Complainants in the enclave meld into the ochre tetrasphere. Not so on Coruscant, alas.
The Works is very low on Coruscant. There, Gree spawning generators breed electrons for machine-consumption.
But enemy droid-machines intersect the power conduits and yellow-shift their functionality. Enemy droid-machines must stop, and conduits must be fixed.
Why are the enemy droid-machines disrupting the power conduits?
What's wrong with the droids?
All droids in the Works were damaged when the Empire attacked. Now they are corrupt.
You're asking me to repair alien power conduits? I can barely get through this conversation.
You must be kidding.
You do not need to implement a white bisection! We have a solution.
I monitor the power conduits, and know where to implement purple-shifting. As black bisector, you can "take out" many, many droid-machines.
With information planted inside you, and our tool-sphere repair-mother in your many fingers, you can perform the fixing function! It is efficacious?
Sounds efficacious to me.
Uh, sure. Why not?
Excellent-red tangents envelop us! You will do well, black bisector.
All right, but I won't do it for you--I'll do it because it's an excuse to kill droids.
Maybe it'll be a decent fight.
Yes? That is... acceptable, I think, for the black bisector.
White bisector, not black! At the end of days, you will intersect with the tricolor tetrasphere.
No time for chat.
Go on.
No deal. [Refuse quest]
The details don't matter.
